summary: 71 scenes revolving around a recent immigrant, a couple that has just adopted a daughter, a college student and a lonely old man.
cast: Gabriel Cosmin Urdes|Lukas Miko|Otto Grünmandl|Anne Bennent|Udo Samel|Branko Samarovski|Claudia Martini|Georg Friedrich|Alexander Pschill|Klaus Händl|Corina Eder|Dorothee Hartinger|Patricia Hirschbichler|Barbara Nothegger|Sebastian Stan|Gudrun Gutt|Michael Jackson|Johannes Kollmann|Karl Künstler|Clemens Matzka|Wolfgang Michalek|Jan Sedlacek|Axel Sichrovsky|Lucia Steindl|Ernst Taschl|Herbert Waibel
title: 71 Fragmente einer Chronologie des Zufalls
